description: Challenge run for improving your skill level.

This run is meant for people who want to challenge themselves and improve their knowledge of the game, but have little to no experience with challenge runs or speed runs and don't know where to start.
This is not a definitive guide, it's just a route that I felt worked well for me, and might be a starting point for someone else as well.
The guide is dynamic: it suggests a series of restrictive rules, but you can choose to ignore one or more to make the experience more bearable.
This is not a speed run guide, as it's missing many optimizations required for competitive times, but you can still play it going fast.

comments: Realize you already failed the run, since you started with _Loincloth_ equipped and violated rule 3
Collect yourself and pretend this never happened

instructions.where: behind the first hollow
on top of the coffin
inside tunnel beneath dead wyvern
on the roof after mini-Gundyr
on the rooftop right above the plaza with the winged knight, on the same level of the entrance of the building below the crystal lizard
comments: We need one to trade for a _Titanite Chunk_ later on, so don't use all of them >:(

instructions.where: inside building below the crystal lizard
on the anvil at the bottom floor of the building
by running to the elevator and opening the closed gate near the _High Wall of Lothric_ bonfire
given by _Emma_ inside the cathedral
nearby the two dogs at the bottom of the stairs
comments: Walk slowly on the left side of the dogs to avoid triggering them

instructions.where: on the middle floor of the first house after the bonfire
on the ground floor
at the base of the tree with the cultists
on the porch of an house behind the big tree

instructions.text: Run through the burg in the direction of the _Dilapidated Bridge_ bonfire

instructions.where: on the falling platform nearby the cemetery
comments: Enjoy the giant archer killing the farmers for you

instructions.text: Run all the way through the rest of the burg until the _Road of Sacrifices_ bonfire
comments: You can lose the Hollow Manservants on the bridge by letting them follow you on the house on the right, then sprinting away towards your destination

instructions.where: on a roof at the very top of the area with the fire demon
comments: The ring grants a boost on damage based on your equip load, so with the build of this guide it will range between 7.5% (13.5 equip load) to 10% (9 equip load)
Removing _Sorcerer's Staff_ and _Grass Crest Shield_ during fights might increase the damage dealt
More about _Flynn's Ring_: http://darksouls3.wikidot.com/ring:flynn-s-ring
This is a very long detour, and it is questionable whether the ring is worth or not

instructions.where: after the first storyteller, circling back up the higher path in the cave with two corvians

instructions.text: Run towards the _Halfway Fortress_ bonfire

instructions.where: at the bottom of the cliff after dropping down on the left from the path after the bonfire
comments: Beware of falling damage while jumping down

instructions.where: surrounded by the venomous mushrooms
behind a tree close to the giant crab closest to the bonfire
comments: Increases stamina regeneration while equipped

instructions.where: on the border of the swamp close to the entrance to the Farron Keep

instructions.text: Bypass the two NPCs and head down to the _Farron Keep_
comments: While climbing down the ladder, hope for at least one of the two idiot NPCs to fall down to their deserved demise
Depending on how fast you want to roll, you might want to unequip part of the armor set while running around, and re-equip it before boss fights

instructions.text: Exit on the right and extinguish the first flame
comments: To move in the deep swamp, use the _Dagger_'s weapon art

instructions.where: behind the flame tower
on the left of the _Farron Keep_ bonfire
at the base of the stairs leading to the second flame

instructions.text: Extinguish the second flame
comments: Be a gamer, don't quit out, and dodge enemies like a boss without bitching about it

instructions.text: Descend the stairs or jump down the hill behind the second flame tower

instructions.where: on the right side of the clearing
on the left side of the clearing just before the stairs

instructions.text: Climb the stairs and extinguish the third and last flame

instructions.where: jumping down on the left side of the bridge after the bonfire
inside the tower full of slugs
after the tower full of slugs
continuing further down after the tower full of slugs

instructions.text: Turn back, climb the ladder that leads to the _Old Wolf of Farron_, take the elevator, and go to area with two dead wyverns

instructions.where: at the center and end of the area with the dead wyverns

instructions.text: Run straight through the gate and go to _Abyss Watchers_
comments: You can avoid most of the ghrus by taking the long way around the hill, still they are a huge pain in the ass

instructions.text: Drop down on the platforms on the right and enter the doorway

instructions.where: where the ball crashes, after killing the skeleton wizard hidden behind the right corner by the entrance

instructions.text: Run to the end and jump down on the lower level
comments: If you can fence skip, why are you even reading this guide

instructions.where: up the stairs in the passage where the smashing boulder is going through, near the bonfire
comments: Beware of the boulder, it can easily kill you

instructions.text: Go back down

instructions.where: at the very end of the area with the falling slugs and equip it
comments: This increases both iframes when rolling and damage taken, no pain no gain

instructions.where: upstairs on the opposite side of the entrance, accessible through a staircase behind a hidden wall

instructions.text: Rush to Wolnir dodging Sasuke's attacks

instructions.where: by opening the gate in the ossuary

comments: One bundle per bracelet (two in total if you're lucky)
3 R1 for first bracelet
6/7 R1 for second bracelet
4 R1 for third bracelet

instructions.text: Go back to the bridge, cut it, and wait for it to fall, then climb down

instructions.where: on a corpse below the fire demon
comments: There is also a _Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier_ (3000 souls) right next to it

instructions.where: inside the tunnel found holding the wall on the right when entering the lake
on two corpses in the cave at the end of the tunnel
spread out on four corpses in the lake, between the entrance, the tunnel, and the giant worm
comments: Dodge ballista bolts like a pro, turning the camera towards the ballista helps

instructions.where: on the edge of the cliff past the giant worm and before the _Demon Ruins_ bonfire
comments: Try going past the worm on the right side

instructions.text: Reach the roof of Firelink by buying the key for 20,000 souls from _Shrine Handmaid_ (lame) or by performing tree skip for style points and bigger wallet
Enter the ruins, stop by _Orbeck_ to say hi and invite him to _Firelink Shrine_, then rush to _Crystal Sage_

comments: Learn spawning patterns so that you won't be wasting time killing copies anymore (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z-c5YFn8CDU)

instructions.text: Bypass a few enemies and reach the _Cathedral of the Deep_ bonfire
Run through dog-hell until you reach the chapel
comments: To deal with teleporting dogs, turn the camera backwards (pointing to the dogs) and swear out loud
Still, beware of the kamikaze hollow

instructions.where: on the pillar surrounded by hollows right outside the chapel

instructions.text: Make your way to the inside of the cathedral, just before having to face the giant

instructions.where: by going downstairs, opening the gate and the door that leads back to the chapel bonfire
in front of the giant, above the cathedral's gate
comments: Boosts attacks damage by 10% when HP is full

instructions.text: Drop down, and traverse the hall abusing the _Dagger_'s sword art

instructions.where: in a passage on the left side of the hall that leads back to the chapel bonfire

instructions.text: Reach the _Deacons_ boss entrance

comments: Make sure your HP is full or the ring will have no effect
If you want to use _Alluring Skulls_ for this boss, remember you will need to buy some more later on or you'll have to go through the dogs before _Sulyvahn_ without any

instructions.text: Run until you reach central Irithyll
Stop where there is a line of snow perpendicular to the bridge, turn around, and wait for the croco-beast to finish charging, then kill it and equip the _Pontiff's Right Eye_ ring that it drops
comments: When it stops in front of you, hit with 3 R1 (stun), 2 R1, and 1 critical stab
The ring increases damage dealt by weapon on successive strikes

instructions.text: Run to the Church of Yorshka

comments: It helps with traversing the infested tunnel unnoticed

instructions.text: Run all the way to the _Distant Manor_ bonfire

comments: It helps going unnoticed by the fire witch

instructions.text: Run through the dungeon

instructions.where: right inside one of the cells we need to open, next to a monstrosity on the wall

instructions.text: Perform dungeon skip or suffer trying to dodge an infinity of rats
comments: Dungeon skip (requires _Spook_): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NYhfzKBwEqk

instructions.where: found back into the dungeon, in the first cell on the right
comments: They allow to buy resins and bundles at _Firelink Shrine_

instructions.text: Delve into the _Profaned Capital_ until the bonfire

instructions.where: next to the capital bonfire

instructions.text: Go down the ladder near the bonfire and jump off when the terrain textures start appearing, then quickly drop down into the ruins and rush to _Yhorm_

comments: Pick up and equip _Storm Ruler_, use the weapon art to deal damage
Pro move: try staying close to bait the guillotine attack, which gives you time to punish him

instructions.text: Make your way through Irythill until Sulyvahn's fog
comments: Use two _Alluring Skulls_ on the stairs with the dogs, hoping to distract enough enemies and survive all the bullshit the game is throwing at you

instructions.where: by opening the gate that leads to the _Church of Yorshka_
comments: Optional, but very recommended, unless you are fully confident in your Sulyvahn's skills
Strat: git gud
On second phase kill the clone as fast as you can

instructions.text: Rush through the big square and proceed upward

instructions.where: on a corpse on the roof just below the Silver Knights
comments: Needed for buying _Large Titanite Shards_ in _Firelink Shrine_

instructions.text: Avoid the Silver Knights and reach the bonfire in _Anor Londo_
Give _Easterner's Ashes_ to _Shrine Handmaid_
Make your way to the boss, nothing special
comments: Cast _Spook_ to jump down the stairs instead of running down

instructions.where: by opening the gate with the level on its left

comments: Keep close distance to prevent him from using magic
Punish his melee attacks as much as possible
When he teleports, he will spawn in the corner most further away from you; you can take advantage of this by waiting a little, then running towards the spawning position

instructions.text: Mentally prepare for the fight with _Dancer_ as you are teleported to Lothric against your will
Speak with _Emma_ (or kill her if you feel evil) and place the _Basin of Vows_ on the pillar

comments: Try staying behind and hit cautiously, never get too greedy as she can counter-attack quite quickly
Stay glued to her ass during the transition to second phase, roll only on the final whirl

instructions.text: Climb the ladder, go towards the _Consumed King's Garden_, take the elevator down, jump off on the middle floor, and prepare to get your hands on some _Titanite Chunks_
comments: How to navigate the area: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LkQzzEYTGOg

instructions.where: on the right side of the middle floor
on the broken stairs on the left side of the middle floor
by running straight and climbing the stairs onto the platform
comments: Be wary of the Pus of Man that roam the area

instructions.where: in the corner on the opposite side of the area
next to the shortcut door, accessible by taking the side-elevator located near the previous _Titanite Chunk_

instructions.text: Open the door and go back into the cathedral

rules.5: No _Estus Flask_ upgrades with _Undead Bone Shards_
rules.7: No parries during boss fights (doing Sulyvahn the hard way)
rules.9: Be fast and fearless: no detours for upgrades and skip safety bonfires
